
// Java program to find area and circumference of circle without using method
public class Q10_A_Java_Ass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double area, circumference;
		double radius=4;
		double PI = 3.14;
		
		area=3.24*radius*radius;
		circumference = 2*3.14*radius;
		
		System.out.println("Area of circle :" +area);
		System.out.println("Circumference of circle without using the method:"+circumference);
		

	}

}

OutPut:-
Area of circle :51.84
Circumference of circle without using the method:25.12
